price: "Sunã mãsu gaggãwa, mãsu ɗaukaka kãwunansu zuwa sama ƙiftawar ganinsu ba ta kõmãwa gare su. Kuma zukãtansu wõfintattu."*
arabic: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُقۡنِعِي رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡۖ وَأَفۡـِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَوَآءٞ
footnotes: * A nan ne iyakar maganar shugabanmu Ibrahĩm da Addu'ar sa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: muh'ṭiʿīna muq'niʿī ruūsihim lā yartaddu ilayhim ṭarfuhum wa-afidatuhum hawāon
